title: Don’t Chase Riches
verse_text: For the love of money is a root of all kinds of evil.
insight: Money is a tool, not a god.
Money itself isn’t evil, but when money becomes master, it destroys.
one_minute_win: List one area where money controls you - and pray to release it.
declaration: I use money. Money doesn’t use me.
related_devotionals: Matthew 6:24 Devotional - You Cannot Serve Both God and Money
Proverbs 30:8 Devotional - Give Me Neither Poverty nor Riches
